hero.heading: Build the Future of Bitcoin in Vancouver
hero.subheading: Join our community of builders, learners, and Bitcoin enthusiasts exploring Layer 2 solutions and Lightning Network

sections.title: Welcome to Builder Vancouver
sections.body: Builder Vancouver is a community-driven meetup focused on Bitcoin education, Lightning Network development, and Layer 2 exploration. We bring together developers, enthusiasts, and curious minds to learn, build, and advance Bitcoin technology together.

sections.title: What We Do
sections.body: We host regular meetups featuring technical presentations, hands-on workshops, and collaborative building sessions. Whether you're a seasoned Bitcoin developer or just getting started, there's a place for you in our community.

sections.title: Who Thrives at Builder
sections.body: Our meetups are intentionally cross-disciplinary so every member sees the bigger picture. These are the four core builder personas we support and how Builder accelerates their work.

highlights.title: Product Managers
highlights.description: Pressure-test roadmap ideas with subject-matter experts, surface real user problems, and leave with validated feature hypotheses.

highlights.title: Developers
highlights.description: Pair up on Lightning, Nostr, and L2 code, share tooling, and get code-level feedback from engineers shipping Bitcoin infrastructure.

highlights.title: UI/UX Designers
highlights.description: Prototype wallet flows, usability-test new concepts with the community, and learn how to translate complex crypto UX into clear stories.

highlights.title: Entrepreneurs
highlights.description: Meet co-founders, find early adopters, and understand the regulatory and market realities for Bitcoin-first businesses in Vancouver.

meta.title: Builder Vancouver | Bitcoin Meetups & Education
meta.description: Join Builder Vancouver for Bitcoin meetups, Lightning Network education, and Layer 2 exploration. Connect with the local Bitcoin community.
